missing.game.items.movable

Class Craftable

  • java.lang.Object
    • missing.game.items.Item
      • missing.game.items.movable.Movable
        • missing.game.items.movable.Usable
          • missing.game.items.movable.Craftable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, WorldTile.TileObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Tool

    public abstract class Craftable
extends Usable
    This class represents a Craftable item in the Game. It extends the Usable, Movable and Item subclasses. A Craftable object requires a list of resource in order to make.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • createTool

        public static Tool createTool(Tool.ToolType type,
                              Player player)
                       throws GameException
        This method checks the item inside the player's hand and compares it with the list of ingredients needed to create the tool. If it matches, then it returns the tool which the player wants to create, otherwise it throws a GameException.
        Parameters:
        type -
        player -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        GameException
